page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: Farms in Harpole vary in age,for instance {Hall Farm}which is situated in{GLASSTHORPE}LANE,is very old and has a barn dated around the sevententh century {Riding Hill}farm is a new farm and is mainly used for arable and livestock farming it has thirteen acres of farm land and rents the rest out. {Hall farm}has three hundred and sixty acres of farm land and is used for mixed farming which includes arable,livestock and dairy farming.The old farms in {HARPOLE}usually are built of{NORTHAMPTON}sandstone brick and the new ones usually have just common brickwork.
